name: White Walrus
description: White Walrus is a phenotype of Chernobyl, grown specially by Kushman Veganics for the release of Kevin Smith's film Tusk. This sativa-dominant hybrid, uplifting and mellow in nature, is a limited-time strain available at Los Angeles' Buds & Roses Collective.
attributes_title: Talkative, Uplifted, Creative, Energetic, Euphoric, Cramps, Fatigue, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Paranoid
